item.title: 欧洲航空公司首席执行官呼吁为实现绿色目标提供更多支持
item.description: 欧洲航空公司的首席执行官们呼吁欧盟提供更多支持，以增加绿色喷气燃料的供应，并为这种燃料的生产提供更好的补贴。【原文：Chief executives of Europe's airlines called for more support from the European Union to increase the supply of green jet fuel and better subsidise the creation of the fuel.】

item.title: 米其林发布盈利预警后股价下跌达 11
item.description: 周二，米其林股价下跌达 11%，跌至近三年来的最低点，原因是这家轮胎制造商因北美业务状况疲软而下调了全年收入预期，降幅超过预期。【原文：Shares in Michelin fell as much as 11% on Tuesday, to their lowest in almost three years, after the tire maker cut its forecast for full-year income more than expected due to weak business conditions in North America.】

item.title: 美国生物技术公司纳布拉生物公司与日本武田公司扩大人工智能药物设计合作关系
item.description: 美国生物技术公司纳布拉生物公司（Nabla Bio）周二表示，它已与日本制药商武田制药公司（Takeda Pharmaceutical）签署了第二份重要的研究合作协议，双方将进一步利用人工智能加速药物研发。【原文：U.S. biotech firm Nabla Bio said on Tuesday it has signed a second major research partnership with Japanese drugmaker Takeda Pharmaceutical , deepening their use of artificial intelligence to accelerate drug discovery.】

item.title: 英国摩根先进材料公司因前景黯淡和芯片业务下滑而暴跌
item.description: 周二，摩根先进材料公司股价下滑近 14%，这家英国芯片零部件供应商预计，由于半导体需求疲软和欧洲工业市场的不确定性增加，该公司的年销售额将低于去年。【原文：Shares of Morgan Advanced Materials slipped nearly 14% on Tuesday after the British chip parts supplier forecast annual sales to be lower than last year due to weak semiconductor demand and growing uncertainty in European industrial markets.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国自动驾驶公司 WeRide 正与银行洽谈香港上市事宜
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，中国自动驾驶公司WeRide已聘请摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）和中国国际金融有限公司（China International Capital Corp，简称 "中金公司"）在香港进行二次上市。【原文：Chinese autonomous driving firm WeRide has hired Morgan Stanley and China International Capital Corp (CICC) to work on a secondary listing in Hong Kong, three sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 9 月亚洲股市因美联储降息前景和人工智能乐观情绪吸引资金流入
item.description: 受美国联邦储备委员会九个月来首次降息、对今年进一步宽松政策的预期以及美元走弱提升了对地区资产的需求等因素的推动，亚洲股市在九月份出现了强劲的资金流入。【原文：Asian equities saw strong inflows in September, boosted by the U.S. Federal Reserve’s first rate cut in nine months, expectations of further easing this year, and a weaker dollar that lifted demand for regional assets.】

item.title: 台湾警惕 "网络巨魔军团"，中国网络攻击增多
item.description: 国家安全局的数据显示，与2024年相比，今年迄今为止中国对台湾政府部门的网络攻击增加了17%，平均每天达到280万次。【原文：Chinese cyberattacks on Taiwan government departments have increased by 17% so far this year compared to 2024, reaching an average of 2.8 million per day, data from the National Security Bureau showed.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国正在加大稀土磁铁出口许可证的申请难度
item.description: 消息人士称，自 9 月份以来，中国稀土磁铁公司的出口许可证申请一直面临着更严格的审查，甚至在中国政府上周采取行动扩大对磁铁所用关键矿物的控制之前也是如此。【原文：Chinese rare earth magnet companies have been facing tighter scrutiny on export license applications since September, sources say, even before Beijing's move last week to expand controls over the critical minerals used in magnets.】

item.title: 韩国称美国投资方案贸易谈判取得 "巨大进展
item.description: 韩国财政部长顾润哲（Koo Yun-cheol）周二表示，美国没有坚持要求韩国将今年 7 月达成的贸易协议中承诺的 3,500 亿美元投资全部以直接投资的形式进行，这是 "巨大的进步"。【原文：South Korean Finance Minister Koo Yun-cheol said on Tuesday it was "huge progress" that the U.S. was not insisting that South Korea make all of the $350 billion investments, promised in a trade deal reached in July, in the form of direct investment.】

item.title: 大众汽车股价上涨，投资者在收盘前电话会议中得到安抚
item.description: 周二股市开盘后，大众汽车股价上涨 1.2%，这家德国汽车制造商在发布第三季度财报前，似乎在关税和豪华品牌疲软带来的不利因素方面向投资者作出了保证。【原文：Shares in Volkswagen were trading 1.2% higher after markets opened on Tuesday, as the German automaker appeared to reassure investors over headwinds from tariffs and weakness in its luxury brands before releasing third-quarter results.】

item.title: 阿联酋星际之门人工智能园区首批 200 兆瓦电力将于明年投入使用
item.description: 阿布扎比支持的云计算和人工智能公司 G42 的一位官员周二表示，计划在阿拉伯联合酋长国建设的 5 千兆瓦人工智能园区的首批 200 兆瓦将于明年投入使用。【原文：The first 200 megawatts of a planned 5-gigawatt artificial intelligence campus in the United Arab Emirates should come online next year, an official from Abu Dhabi-backed cloud and AI firm G42 said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英国石油公司石油交易疲软，上游产出增长
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）表示，该公司预计第三季度上游生产将有所增长，扭转了此前略有下降的预期，但该公司在 11 月 4 日发布的最新业绩报告中指出，石油贸易表现疲软。【原文：BP said it expects upstream production to rise in the third quarter, reversing earlier guidance for a slight decline, but flagged weak oil trading performance in a trading update ahead of results due on November 4.】

item.title: 德国 9 月最终通胀率确认为 2.4
item.description: 德国联邦统计局周四称，9月份德国通胀率小幅上升至2.4%，证实了初步数据。【原文：German inflation rose slightly in September to 2.4%, the federal statistics office said on Thursday, confirming preliminary data.】

item.title: 法国阳狮集团称人工智能推动其增长，再次上调年度预期
item.description: 法国广告公司阳狮周一第二次上调了全年有机增长预期，强调人工智能产品是其主要增长动力。【原文：French advertising firm Publicis on Monday raised its full-year organic growth forecast for the second time, highlighting artificial intelligence products as its main growth driver.】

item.title: 受汽车业务增长提振，TomTom 第三季度利润超出预期
item.description: 荷兰数字地图专家 TomTom 周二公布，受汽车定位技术业务增长的推动，其第三季度营业利润增长，超出市场预期。【原文：Dutch digital mapping specialist TomTom reported a rise in its third-quarter operating profit on Tuesday, beating market expectations, boosted by growth in its automotive location technology business.】

item.title: 尽管销售额下滑，爱立信季度核心利润仍超出预期
item.description: 本周二，瑞典电信设备制造商爱立信公司（Ericsson）公布的季度核心盈利增长超出预期，原因是尽管销售额下降，但运营改进推动了利润率的增长。【原文：Swedish telecoms equipment maker Ericsson reported a rise in quarterly core earnings that beat expectations on Tuesday, as operational improvements drove margins growth despite a decline in sales.】

item.title: 前沿债务在高成本和创新交易中面临 "走向黑暗 "的风险
item.description: 新兴经济体需要在债务问题上更加透明，这是一个将富裕国家和多边贷款机构团结在一起的问题，在这个纷争、分裂的世界里，国际秩序和发展融资都面临着压力。【原文：The need for emerging economies to be more transparent about their debt is one issue uniting wealthy countries and multilateral lenders in a fractious, divided world where the international order and development finance face pressure.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，计划于 12 月在美国上市的 PayPay 估值可能超过 200 亿美元
item.description: 据两位消息人士称，随着软银准备最早于 12 月在美国对这家日本支付应用运营商进行首次公开募股，投资者预计 PayPay 的估值可能会超过 3 万亿日元（约合 200 亿美元）。【原文：Investors expect the valuation of PayPay could exceed 3 trillion yen ($20 billion) as SoftBank prepares for an initial public offering of the Japanese payments app operator in the United States as early as December, according to two sources.】

item.title: 早间竞标船与船之间的舞蹈
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特（Gregor Stuart Hunter）展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天：【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter:】

item.title: 中国对与美国有关联的韩国韩华造船公司采取措施
item.description: 在世界两大经济体贸易关系紧张之际，中国周二宣布对韩国造船企业韩华海洋旗下五家与美国有关联的子公司实施制裁，导致该公司股价大幅下跌。【原文：China announced sanctions on Tuesday against five U.S.-linked subsidiaries of South Korean shipbuilder Hanwha Ocean amid trade tensions between the world's two largest economies, sending the company's shares sharply lower.】

item.title: 据当地媒体报道，美国推迟对新加坡医药出口征收关税的实施日期
item.description: 海峡时报》（Straits Times）周二援引一位初级部长的话称，美国对新加坡药品出口征收关税的实施已被推迟，以便企业与美国政府就可能的豁免进行谈判。【原文：The implementation of a U.S. tariff on Singapore's pharmaceutical exports has been delayed to allow companies to negotiate possible exemptions with the U.S. administration, the Straits Times newspaper cited a junior minister as saying on Tuesday.】

item.title: 奥地利地产大亨雷内-本科（Rene Benko）欺诈案即将开庭审理
item.description: 奥地利前亿万富翁雷内-本科（Rene Benko）将于本周二出庭受审，这是他的地产集团 Signa 倒闭后的第一起案件。【原文：Austrian former billionaire Rene Benko goes on trial on Tuesday in the first case tackling the collapse of his property group Signa, which at its peak acquired stakes in New York's Chrysler Building and the British department-store chain Selfridges.】

item.title: 芯片供应商 ASML 将搭乘人工智能巨头的顺风车
item.description: 人工智能公司与计算机芯片制造商之间的数十亿美元交易有望在本周三公布的第三季度财报中增强顶级半导体设备制造商 ASML 的前景。【原文：Multi-billion dollar deals between AI firms and computer chipmakers are expected to strengthen top semiconductor equipment maker ASML's outlook when it reports third-quarter earnings on Wednesday.】

item.title: 印度纺织品出口商转向欧洲，提供折扣以抵消美国关税
item.description: 印度纺织品出口商正在欧洲寻找新的买家，并向现有的美国客户提供折扣，以减轻美国高达 50%的陡峭关税带来的打击。【原文：Indian textile exporters are seeking new buyers in Europe and offering discounts to existing U.S. customers to cushion the blow from steep U.S. tariffs of as much as 50%, industry executives said.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，西班牙是中国汽车制造商比亚迪在欧洲建立第三家工厂的首选之地
item.description: 两位知情人士告诉路透社，中国第一大汽车制造商比亚迪认为西班牙是其建立第三家汽车厂以服务欧洲市场的首选之地，因为该公司正寻求在欧洲大陆扩大销售。【原文：China's No. 1 automaker BYD considers Spain to be its top candidate for a third car factory to serve the European market, two people briefed on the matter told Reuters, as the company seeks to grow sales on the continent.】

item.title: 谷歌将投资 100 亿美元在南印度建设数据中心
item.description: 印度安得拉邦的一位部长表示，Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司将投资 100 亿美元，在印度南部的安得拉邦建立一个 1 千兆瓦的数据中心。【原文：Alphabet Inc's Google will invest $10 billion to set up a 1-gigawatt data centre in the southern Indian state of Andhra Pradesh, a state minister said.】

item.title: 亚洲市场在华尔街复苏之际奋力上扬
item.description: 周二早盘，亚洲股市出现试探性反弹，在有迹象表明中美贸易谈判仍在按部就班进行之后，各地区股市出现了不均衡的复苏。【原文：Asian stocks made a tentative rebound in early trade on Tuesday, with an uneven recovery taking place across regional equity markets after signs that trade negotiations between the U.S. and China remain on track.】

item.title: 中美缓和贸易紧张局势，石油价格上扬
item.description: 周二，油价上涨，因为中美贸易紧张局势解冻的早期迹象提振了市场情绪，缓解了对全球燃料需求的担忧。【原文：Oil prices rose on Tuesday as early signs of a thaw in U.S.-China trade tensions bolstered market sentiment, alleviating concerns over global fuel demand.】

item.title: 中美贸易摩擦再起的担忧减弱，美元反弹
item.description: 美元周二持稳，原因是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普淡化了对中国征收关税的言论，而且他可能与中国总统会晤，这使人们对这两个经济重镇之间的紧张局势有望缓和产生了希望。【原文：The dollar held steady on Tuesday as U.S. President Donald Trump's watered down rhetoric against tariffs on China and a potential meeting with his Chinese counterpart raised hopes of de-escalation in tensions between the two economic heavyweights.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行将保持谨慎，数据取决于未来政策
item.description: 路透社悉尼10月14日电）澳大利亚央行在9月份的政策会议上认为，鉴于服务业通胀的一些粘性和稳定的就业，没有必要立即降息，而未来的宽松政策将取决于数据。【原文：SYDNEY, Oct 14 (Reuters) - Australia's central bank saw no need for an immediate cut in interest rates at its September policy meeting given some stickiness in services inflation and steady employment, while future easing would be data dependent.】
